submission:
class Solution:
    def maximumLength(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        dp = [defaultdict(int) for _ in range(k+1)]
        mx = [0] * len(dp)
        ans = 0
        for c in nums:
            for i in range(len(dp) - 1, 0 , -1):
                dp[i][c] += 1
                dp[i][c] = max(dp[i][c] , mx[i-1] + 1)
                mx[i] = max(mx[i] , dp[i][c])
                ans = max(ans , dp[i][c])
            dp[0][c] += 1
            mx[0] = max(mx[0] , dp[0][c])
            ans = max(dp[0][c], ans)
        return ans
